scripts.build:rollup: pulp build -- --source-maps && rollup --config && yarn run uglify:rollup && yarn run jsmin:rollup
scripts.build:webpack: pulp build -- --source-maps && webpack && yarn run uglify:webpack && yarn run jsmin:webpack
scripts.build:purs-bundle: pulp build --main Main --optimise --to dist/js/purs-bundle.js && yarn run uglify:purs-bundle && yarn run jsmin:purs-bundle
scripts.build:pulp-browserify: pulp browserify --main Main --optimise --to dist/js/pulp-browserify.js && yarn run uglify:pulp-browserify && yarn run jsmin:pulp-browserify
